text: Hi everyone, have a question related to module. I am creating repeater field module in that I need to add background image. So I use `widget_data.header_image.src` this piece of code. But it's not working.
if it is in a repeater within a module, the default code is going to will be something like `item.header_image_src`
look at the repeater and copy the snippet.  you should see the markup you need in there
